alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Atkinson and northwestern Ware Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of strong thunderstorms centered near Dixie Union, or 12 miles northwest of Waycross, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pebble Hill, Dixie Union and Millwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
